description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Choose your favorite farm animal and go hog-wild challenging your barnyard buddies in a game of cerebral mind-ticklers. Hen-peck your way through a range of math problems, from basic math for the baby chicks to mind-crushing equations for cocky roosters.
description.short: Choose your favorite farm animal and go hog-wild challenging your barnyard buddies in a game of cerebral mind-ticklers. Hen-peck your way through a range of math problems, from basic math for the baby chicks to mind-crushing equations for cocky roosters.
